about_the_game:
Welcome to Operation Blackout, a game where tension and danger follow you at every turn. A factory abandoned decades ago has become the source of strange and terrifying events. Mercenaries like you are tasked with exploring the place, but no one expected to encounter the monsters that hide in its gloomy corridors.

Your goal is to survive. Find weapons, ammunition and medical kits to cope with what lies ahead. Use tactical thinking to not only fight, but also to survive with limited resources. Every decision can determine if you stay alive.

Game Features:

- Tense firefights: Fight a variety of monsters, each with unique tactics and weaknesses.

- Explore and gather resources: Find weapons, ammo and supplies to prepare for the next battle.

- Atmospheric World: Realistic visuals, sound and lighting immerse you in an oppressive atmosphere.

- Unique adversary: Find out who or what is behind the appearance of monsters and solve the mystery of the factory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 или AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 570
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Operation Blackout is an atmospheric first-person shooter where you venture into an abandoned industrial facility to eliminate unknown monsters. Use your skills, scavenge for weapons and supplies, and uncover the secrets lurking in the shadows of this dark place.
